verses.verse: And <WG2532> Again <WG3825> He Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> Capernaum <WG2584> ' After Some <WG1223> Days, <WG2250> And <WG2532> It Was Heard <WG191> That <WG3754> In The <WG1519> House <WG3624> He Is; <WG2076>

<WG2258> But There Were <WG1161> Some <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122> There <WG1563> Sitting, <WG2521> And <WG2532> Reasoning <WG1260> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2588> Their Hearts, <WG846>

Which <WG5101> Is <WG2076> Easier, <WG2123> To Say <WG2036> To The <WG3588> Paralytic, <WG3885> Have Been Forgiven <WG863> Thee Thy <WG4671> <WG3588> Sins, <WG266> Or <WG2228> To Say, <WG2036> Arise, <WG1453> And <WG2532> Take Up <WG142> Thy <WG4675> <WG3588> Couch <WG2895> And <WG2532> Walk? <WG4043>

<WG2443> But That <WG1161> Ye May Know <WG1492> That <WG3754> Authority <WG1849> Has <WG2192> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of Man <WG444> To Forgive <WG863> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> Sins, <WG266> He Says <WG3004> To The <WG3588> Paralytic, <WG3885>

And <WG2532> He Arose <WG1453>, Immediately, <WG2112> And <WG2532> Having Taken Up <WG142> The <WG3588> Couch <WG2895> Went Forth <WG1831> Before <WG1726> All, <WG3956> So That <WG5620> Were Amazed <WG1839> All, <WG3956> And <WG2532> Glorified <WG1392> <WG3588> God, <WG2316> <WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> Never <WG3763> Thus <WG3779> Did We See It. <WG1492>

And <WG2532> <WG1096> It Came To Pass <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2621> As He Reclined At Table <WG846> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3614> His House, <WG846> That <WG2532> Many <WG4183> Tax Gatherers <WG5057> And <WG2532> Sinners <WG268> Were Reclining At Table With <WG4873> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples; <WG846> <WG2258> For They Were <WG1063> Many, <WG4183> And <WG2532> They Followed <WG190> Him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122> And <WG2532> The <WG3588>, Pharisees, <WG5330> Having Seen <WG1492> Him <WG846> Eating <WG2068> With <WG3326> The <WG3588> Tax Gatherers <WG5057> And <WG2532> Sinners, <WG268> Said <WG3004> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples, <WG846> Why Is It <WG5101> That <WG3754> With <WG3326> The <WG3588> Tax Gatherers <WG5057> And <WG2532> Sinners <WG268> He Eats <WG2068> And <WG2532> Drinks? <WG4095>

<WG2064> But Will Come <WG1161> Days <WG2250> When <WG3752> Will Have Been Taken Away <WG522> ' From <WG575> Them <WG846> The <WG3588> Bridegroom, <WG3566> And <WG2532> Then <WG5119> They Will Fast <WG3522> In <WG1722> Those <WG1565> <WG3588> Days. <WG2250>

And <WG2532> No One <WG3762> A Piece <WG1915> Of Cloth <WG4470> Unfulled <WG46> Sews <WG1976> On <WG1909> <WG2440> An Old Garment; <WG3820> <WG1487> <WG1161> Otherwise, <WG3361> Takes Away <WG142> The <WG3588> Filling Up <WG4138> Of It <WG846> <WG3588> New <WG2537> From The <WG3588> Old, <WG3820> And <WG2532> Worse <WG5501> A Rent <WG4978> Takes Place. <WG1096>

How <WG4459> He Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> House <WG3624> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> In The Days Of <WG1909> Abiathar <WG8> The <WG3588> High Priest, <WG749> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Loaves <WG740> Of The <WG3588> Presentation <WG4286> Ate, <WG5315> Which <WG3739> <WG3756> It Is Not Lawful <WG1832> <WG5315> To Eat <WG1487> Except <WG3361> For The <WG3588> Priests, <WG2409> And <WG2532> Gave <WG1325> Even <WG2532> To Those Who <WG3588> With <WG4862> Him <WG846> Were? <WG5607>
